narrative: You stand at a crossroads. To the west, a dark forest looms. To the east, village lights twinkle in the distance. The path behind you leads back south.

objects.description: A weathered wooden signpost pointing in all directions

npcs.name: Wandering Traveler
npcs.description: A weathered traveler sits by the signpost, studying a worn map

exits.description: A narrow path leading into the dark forest
A well-trodden road heading toward the village
The path you came from, leading back
